object.name: getBusinessAccountStarBalance
object.description: Returns the amount of Telegram Stars owned by a managed business account. Requires the can_view_gifts_and_stars business bot right. Returns StarAmount on success.
object.html_description: Returns the amount of Telegram Stars owned by a managed business account. Requires the can_view_gifts_and_stars business bot right. Returns StarAmount on success.
object.rst_description: Returns the amount of Telegram Stars owned by a managed business account. Requires the *can_view_gifts_and_stars* business bot right. Returns :class:`aiogram.types.star_amount.StarAmount` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id
